question: An Exhibition 'India and the World: A History in Nine Stories' will be inaugurated by __________.
explanation: An Exhibition called 'India and the World: A History in Nine Stories' will be inaugurated at the National Museum auditorium, New Delhi by Dr. Mahesh Sharma ,Minister of State for Culture(I/c) and Minister of State for Environment, Forest and Climate Change. This effort made by the British Museum, London; National Museum, New Delhi; and ChhatrapatiShivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya (CSMVS), Mumbai with support of the Culture Ministry. The exhibition evaluates the development of Indian civilization in a sequel order through delicate artifact from India and abroad. 'India and the World: A History in Nine Stories'deeps into two million years of history. This exhibition will be a part of memorial of 70 years of India's independence and a year of major cultural exchange between India and the UK (UK/India 2017).
